descriptionHtml:
Here\'s a spell I missed from Oblivion.  I mean, sure you could find or make the potion, and there\'s ONE undisenchantable pair of  boots that has the enchantment, but in case you\'re not a potion maker, or if you don\'t want to take the time to look for them, or if you don\'t want to lug around a heavy pair of boots, here\'s the spell.  Just buy the tome from anyone that sells Adept level Alteration spell tomes.  The duration and spell cost is basically identical to the waterbreathing spell.

This mod requires Dragonborn, of course.

Enjoy.
author: CaptainRC
